message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11000. It's a fair price considering its value. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. While I appreciate your offer, $8000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further to $9500. This is a fair price, considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested.

I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, but $9500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $9000. I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial price.
